location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 14 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has slightly obscured some of the body of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that the Resident has terminated all the mercantile activity he was engaged with, as per the instructions contained in the Government's commands dated 13 February 1822 (No 275 of 1822).
